name: Noctiny
languages: Common, plus the language spoken by the noctini's fext master

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The noctiny has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pact Wrath
text: One of the noctiny's weapons is infused with power. Its attacks with this weapon count as magical, and it adds its Charisma bonus to the weapon's damage (included below).

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The noctiny is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability score is Charisma (save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following warlock spells.
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, poison spray
1st level (4 slots): armor of agathys, charm person, hellish rebuke, hex
2nd level (2 slots): crown of madness, misty step

action.name: Multiattack
text: The noctiny makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Pact Staff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used in two hands.
